Tips for Learning with Videos

Use Subtitles

Start with subtitles in your language, then switch to English subtitles, and finally try without them.

Watch Repeatedly

Watch videos multiple times to catch details you missed and improve comprehension.

Shadow the Speaker

Try to speak along with the video to improve your pronunciation and intonation.

Take Notes

Write down new words and phrases to review later and reinforce your learning.

English Learning Hub

A comprehensive blog for English language learners with vocabulary lists and educational videos to improve your skills.
